FAIL_TO_PASS: when implicit help option then help option not affected
when argument then included in helpInformation
when program has command with optional arg then appears in help
when negated option then option included in helpInformation
when custom .version then helpInformation includes custom version help
when add custom help command then custom help command
when command sets hidden then not displayed in helpInformation
when add two options then help contains group with two options
when command sets deprecated noHelp then not displayed in helpInformation
when .helpCommand(true) then help command in group
when helpOption(true) after customise then helpInformation still customised
when showGlobalOptions:true and no global options then global options header not shown
when "afterAll" string then string after built-in help
when "before" function returns nothing then no effect
when helpOption(true) after false then helpInformation does include --help
when default .version then helpInformation includes default version help
when helpOption has just flags then helpInformation includes default description
when program has required option not specified and subcommand --help then help
when default configuration then global options hidden
when all the simple positions then strings in order
